org.graphspace.javaclient

Class Groups

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.graphspace.javaclient.Groups

  • public class Groups
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides methods for group related operations such as saving, fetching, updating, deleting groups on GraphSpace. Also provides methods for group member and group graph related operations such as fetching all members or graphs of the group, adding or deleting new member or graph to the group.
    Author:
    rishabh
